backend/main.mo: Actor storing timestamped text messages with methods to add and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing addition of Contact Us navigation item and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of summarized descriptions for various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes including the /contact page with I18nProvider.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24Car: Reusable styled card component with optional click interaction.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24For: Form field wrapper showing label, errors, helper text, and child input.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactV: Dialog form for contacting a worker with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/contact/Work24Of: Dialog showing official phone and email contact details.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer with contact info, service description, quick links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header with navigation including Contact Us and language switching.
Wraps the app with header, footer, and main layout structure.
frontend/src/components/materials/Materi: Displays sanitized material info with image, details, and a contact button.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Provides a dropdown to switch app language using i18n context.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Shows sanitized worker details, image gallery, and a contact action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches messages from the backend using the current actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, translation lookup, and persistence for i18n.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines translation dictionaries and types for supported languages.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, theme variables, and global typography.
frontend/src/lib/contactSubmissions.ts: Sends contact submissions to backend via actor and invalidates messages cache.
frontend/src/lib/localPreferences.ts: Handles onboarding, language, and user preference persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/materialsStorage.ts: Manages localStorage-based material retrieval and creation.
frontend/src/lib/officialContact.ts: Stores official Work24 phone and email constants with formatted links.
Sanitizes worker and material objects by whitelisting allowed fields.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the service list and provides lookup by service ID.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides required and mobile number validation helpers returning translated error messages.
frontend/src/lib/workersStorage.ts: Manages worker data in localStorage, including retrieval, filtering by service, and adding new workers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/Architect.tsx: Implements an architect project submission form with validation, file uploads, and contact submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/Career.tsx: Implements a career application form with required and mobile validation and submits data via contact submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Displays official contact details and a services info panel with localized text.
frontend/src/pages/HomeServices.tsx: Renders the home page hero section and lists available services, allowing navigation to individual service pages.
frontend/src/pages/Materials.tsx: Shows stored materials and opens a contact panel; loads materials from localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Collects user name and language preference, validates input, saves onboarding state, and redirects home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerMaterialSubmiss: Provides a form for sellers to submit new materials with validation and image upload converted to base64 for storage.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Displays a serviceâ€™s details and lists workers for that service, with a dialog for contacting a selected worker.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerSubmission.tsx: Implements a worker submission form with validation, image uploads, and adding the worker to storage before redirecting.
frontend/src/types/materials.ts: Defines the Material interface with fields for metadata and images.
frontend/src/types/workers.ts: Defines the Worker interface including profile and work image fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature state, and pending requests for the Contact Us navigation item.
